Description:
'Atherton' - Magnificent Victorian Home on the Hill - Land 1089sqmts approx
Grand proportions, timeless period elegance and revered historical significance are the hallmarks that place "Atherton" c1890 amongst the finest homes in the McKinnon Secondary College Zone. Set in the heart of Ormond's' historic hill precinct of high-calibre period homes, this stately Victorian residence offers an exciting step up to fine family living with 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom accommodation and 3 distinct living zones over one expansive level.
A fine example of the era with every period detail (including original Baltic pine floors, high ornate ceilings and stunning leadlight entry) a grand arched hallway links each integral part of the home featuring formal lounge and dining rooms adorned by marble open fireplaces, casual living and dining beyond a granite/blackwood timber kitchen and stylish bathrooms (including an ensuite for the bay-windowed master).
Then look beyond the bluestone foundations to find magnificent formal gardens with outlooks in every direction from a wide return veranda, a built in barbeque for the private alfresco area meticulously matched by red brick pavers against a breathtaking garden milieu.
Appointed to an elite standard with hydronic heating and split system air-conditioning and optioned up with an executive study/4th bedroom, the home features stainless steel appliances, robes to all bedrooms, alarm, laundry, a separate workshop and a storage loft in the double carport.
Within close proximity to North, McKinnon and Centre Roads cosmopolitan shopping strips, train stations, great schools and Allnutt park, take your place in history, enjoy period-perfect family living and capitalise on 1087sqm approx of prime McKinnon zone land. Step into this beautiful original home, step out to a big backyard, find a family-wise floorplan in-between and capitalise on 718sqm approx of prime McKinnon Secondary College zone land.
Discreetly extended to offer effortless indoor-outdoor living, this updated 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom c1939 brick home combines the period grace aesthetic of its era with the triple zone design that modern families love.
Traditionally configured with interconnected formal lounge and dining rooms, the home sees soaring ceilings enhance the widespread family zone offering room to lounge in a garden view living retreat and dine beyond a Caesar stone and Ilve appliance kitchen.
Appointed to an elite standard with a stylish ensuite for the fan-cooled master, the home showcases a beautiful contrast of original hardwood and brush box timber floors, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, robes to all bedrooms, alarm for security and streamlined storage.
But it's not just the interior that sets this home apart. Only moments from in-zone McKinnon Primary & Secondary schools, North Road's cosmopolitan strip and train station and Joyce park. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Enjoy space and light-filled luxury on the doorstep of Ormond Village
Elevated, light-filled and roomy, this two bedroom apartment flaunts sassy styling in an enormous north-facing space, quietly positioned on the top floor of a newly renovated boutique block of only 15. Discover a vivacious lifestyle from this restful retreat, within skipping distance of Ormond Village, transport and recreation.
The vast open plan living area easily accommodates dinner parties, extending onto a spacious full-width balcony, perfect for the barbecue crowd, and enhanced by a fully-appointed Euro kitchen, smartly dressed in stone-topped gloss cabinetry with sparkling glass splashback. This functional and stylish floorplan comprises a generous master bedroom with private balcony and extensive robes, plus second bedroom/study, chic bathroom with lavish shower and granite vanity, and a neatly placed European laundry with storage.
A quiet double-brick construction enjoys a consistent climate with added comforts of split-system air-conditioning, secure intercom entry, basement parking and extensive secure basement storage.
A lifestyle location for first home buyers or investors, just metres from buses and trains, exciting restaurants, cafés and shopping at Ormond Village, and with easy access to parks, sporting facilities and bike tracks.
